page.title: 19LEISURE AND RECREATION
page.content: { }Study area is remote and rural.Nearest towns are 12 miles away and public transport very limited. Much leisure activity is self-made or family orientated. {Clubs,Societies,Organisations. Wednesday Club - social activities for 'over-60's'. Cricket Club - cricket team competes in local leagues. Football Club - formed 1985. Currently being developed. Methodist Sunday School - religous group of young people. Pathfinders - teenagers meeting to discuss topical and social issues. Womens' Institute - a group of women who meet socially and for the advancement of womens' education. Evening Classes - Keep Fit, Flower arranging,Crafts etc.
